name: @jooycar/tbk-lib
description: Library with methods for saving the Jooycar payment orders in DynamoDB

scripts.build: mkdir -p nodejs/node_modules/@jooycar/tbk-lib && cp -R src index.js package.json nodejs/node_modules/@jooycar/tbk-lib/
scripts.coverage: TZ=utc nyc --all --reporter=html npm run test && open ./coverage/index.html
